item.title: Other Websites
item.description: Other websites related to the McDonald’s frauds cases ECtHRwatch - Official website : I will list all the cases I file with the European Court of Human Rights. Robert Spano (Robert-Spano.com) : Róbert Ragnar Spanó, President of the European Court of Human Rights. Non-official website. Europe-v-McDonalds : Open letters to officials and institutions of the European Union. Federal-Bureau-of-Investigation.com (NON-OFFICIAL) : This is a non-official website about the F.B.I. on which I intend to openly publish my communications to them.

item.title: Contact Me
item.description: How to contact me? You can send me a direct message through Twitter. My Twitter account is @ECtHRwatch You can also send me an email at: ECTHRwatch (AT) gmail (DOT) com
